SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet

Class Container

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.Container
All Implemented Interfaces:
ManagerContainerService, ClusterContainer
public class Container extends Object implements ManagerContainerService, ClusterContainer
Container for a number of web application contexts. The web container represents a namespace in which contexts can be "mounted".
Author:
Chris Burdess

      Description copied from interface: ClusterContainer
      Returns the multicast group address for cluster discovery.

    • getClusterKey

      public byte[] getClusterKey()
      Description copied from interface: ClusterContainer
      Returns the shared secret key for cluster encryption. The key must be 32 bytes (256 bits) for AES-256.
      Specified by:
      getClusterKey in interface ClusterContainer
      Returns:
      the cluster encryption key, or null if clustering is disabled

    • getContextByDigest

      public SessionContext getContextByDigest(byte[] digest)
      Description copied from interface: ClusterContainer
      Looks up a context by its digest. Used to route incoming cluster messages to the correct context.
      Specified by:
      getContextByDigest in interface ClusterContainer
      Parameters:
      digest - the context digest to look up
      Returns:
      the matching SessionContext, or null if not found

    • getDistributableContexts

      public Iterable<SessionContext> getDistributableContexts()
      Description copied from interface: ClusterContainer
      Returns all contexts that have distributable sessions. Used when a new node joins the cluster and needs all sessions.
      Specified by:
      getDistributableContexts in interface ClusterContainer
      Returns:
      iterable of distributable session contexts
